sourcesContent:
<template lang="pug">
.youtube-configurator
  .input-container
    v-text-field(v-model="userInput"
                 label='Enter a URL or video ID'
                 @keyup.enter="processAction(controllerOptions.PLAY_NOW)"
                 variant='solo'
                 hide-details="auto").input-style
    v-btn.add-style(@click="processAction(controllerOptions.QUEUE)") Queue
  v-switch(v-model="pauseSwitch"
           label='Pause on load'
           color='red'
           :class="{activated: pauseSwitch}").switch-style
  .butonic-plague
    v-btn(@click="onSyncPlaylist").btn-style Sync Playlist
    v-btn(@click="processAction(controllerOptions.PLAY_NEXT)" :disabled="isCurrentPlaylistEmpty").btn-style Play Next

</template>

<script>
import { mapState } from 'pinia'
import { VTextField, VSwitch, VBtn } from 'vuetify/components'
import { usePlaylistStore } from '../store/playlist'
import { useSettingStore } from '../store/settings'
import { videoIdParser } from '../utility/video-id-parser'
import { fetchVideoInformation } from '../utility/youtube-video-validation'
import { YOUTUBE_API_CODES, controllerOptions, PLAY_NEXT } from '../constants/constants'
import {videoController} from '../utility/video-controller'

export default {
  components: {
    VTextField,
    VSwitch,
    VBtn
  },
  emits: ['toggle-switch', 'mouseleave'],
  data() {
    return {
      pauseSwitch: true,
      key: 0,
      userInput: '',
      controllerOptions
    }
  },
  computed: {
    ...mapState(useSettingStore, ['autopause']),
    ...mapState(usePlaylistStore, ['currentPlaylist']),
    hasInput() {
      return this.userInput && this.userInput.replace(/\s/g, '').length
    },
    isCurrentPlaylistEmpty() {
      return this.currentPlaylist.length === 0
    }
  },
  methods: {
    async processAction(ACTION) {
      if (ACTION === PLAY_NEXT) {
        videoController[PLAY_NEXT]()
        return
      }
      if (!this.hasInput) {
        console.warn('no input')
        return
      }
      const userInput = this.userInput
      this.userInput = ''
      const payload = await this.processUserInput(userInput)
      if (payload.status === YOUTUBE_API_CODES.VALID) {
        videoController[ACTION](payload)
      }
    },
    async fetchVideoInfo(videoId) {
      const payload = await fetchVideoInformation(videoId)
      return payload
    },
    onPlayNext() {
      const playStore = usePlaylistStore()
      if (++this.key === playStore.currentPlaylist.length) this.key = 0
      playStore.changeCurrentSongInPlaylist(this.key)
    },
    onSyncPlaylist() {
      // const playStore = usePlaylistStore()
      // playStore.syncPlaylist()
      // console.log(this.$store);
      this.$store.playlist.syncPlaylist()

    },
    async processUserInput(userInput) {
      const videoId = videoIdParser(userInput)
      if (!videoId) {
        console.warn('improper videoId')
        return null
      }
      const payload = await this.fetchVideoInfo(videoId)
      return payload
    }
  },
  watch: {
    pauseSwitch() {
      const playStore = useSettingStore()
      playStore.toggleAutopause()
    }
  }
}
</script>
<style></style>
<style lang="scss" scoped>
@import 'src/styles/flex';

$input-height : 50px;

.youtube-configurator {
  @include flex-column();
  justify-content: space-between;
  padding: 25px;


  .input-container {
    @include flex-row();
    box-sizing: border-box;
    padding: 10px;

    .input-style {
      width: 350px;
      margin: 0 5px;
    }

    .add-style {
      height: $input-height;
    }
  }

  .btn-style {
    margin-bottom: 10px;
  }

  .activated {
    color: red;
  }

}
</style>
